request.description:
### Upload Brand Logo

This endpoint allows you to upload a brand logo for testing purposes.

#### Request Body

- form-data
    
    - `brand_id`: The ID of the brand.
        
    - `file`: The logo file to be uploaded.
        

#### Example

``` plaintext
brand_id: 1
file: [logo_small_clever.png; type=image/png]

 ```
